name: Qasir al-Wasat: International Edition
description: Qasir al-Wasat is a stealth action-adventure set in a mysterious 12th Century Syrian palace. Play as an invisible and fragile creature summoned from another world to complete an assassination mission inside an enigmatic palace.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7 or 8 Processor: 2 GHz single core processor Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB VRAM, pixel shader 3.0 compatible. Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or 8 Processor: 2.5 GHz dual core processor Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: GDDR5 512 MB VRAM, pixel shader 5.0 compatible. Storage: 2 GB available space
